GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
vdpa_sim_blk: set number of address spaces and virtqueue groups

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit a291c7d289fac2cb13fb2614a9a251afbbd86ce9, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit bda324fd037a6b0d44da5699574ce741ca161bc4. For more details please see the references link.
